Name: Synthrun
About the game: Synthrun is an action-platformer where you take control of 'Jake', a boy trapped in an abstract world. The goal is to collect the energy orbs at the end of each level. Can you collect all 50 and help Jake escape? Features - Race through an abstract track with pumping music in the background. - Use 4 cool powers to help you through. - There are over 50 unique levels to complete! Steam Features - Steam Achievements, the game has 10 achievements . - Steam Leaderboards.
Meta Title: Synthrun: Feb 7, 2019, Playrock Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Synthrun? Check out the release date (Feb 7, 2019), developer insights from Playrock Studios, and a complete game summary.
